data.name: Coronavirus and the Future of Global Finance
data.summary:
What measures should governments and multilateral institutions take to minimize the economic fallout of this pandemic? What lessons does this crisis offer for building resilient supply chains? What could recovery look like?

Join us for a virtual discussion with Trinh Nguyen, Adarsh Sinha, and Pranjul Bhandari, as they examine the future of global finance in the face of the coronavirus pandemic.
